name: Steady Aim
rules: On your turn, if you haven't moved, you gain advantage on your next attack roll this turn.
After you use this feature, your speed is 0 until the end of the current turn.

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/05-Character Classes (Continued) - Player's Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf

trigger: on your turn when you have not moved
